orderInGroup: Order by which the filtering is processed. Important for thresholding by snow_fraction. This column should stay in 2nd position (to be sorted in EspEnv instanciation). (The id of the threshold group should stay in 1st position).
groupType: Indicate where the group is used
thresholdedVarName: Variable upon which the thresholds should be performed
replacedVarName: Variable set to not reliable value when the threshold is applied.
comment: Comment line.
snowCoverDayMins.minElevation
snowCoverDayMins.minSnowCoverFraction. Beware it's on Mosaic since 2023-12-28 (previously on STCube).
Mosaic filtering. This filter set #1 corresponds to v2023.0, v2023.1.
Mosaic/Netcdf Nodata. Introduced in v2023.1 / v2023.0e. 91 for v2023.1 v2023.0 v2023.0b-d,f-g, 67.5 for v2023.0e. Above this value, all is set to nodata.

Mosaic/Netcdf Nodata. Introduced in v2023.1 / v2023.0e. min: 4 (Apr.), max 11 (Nov.): all locations at the false positive mask (dry lakes) have snow_fraction(s) set to 0 and rf, dv, albedo, grain size set to nodata (v2023.0e, v2023.1b), only from the start of the month min to the end of the month max. min: 1, max 12: mask applied full year (v2023.1c, d). 0: v2023.1, v2023.0 v2023.0b-d,f-g doesn't apply the mask.

Mosaic/Netcdf Nodata. Introduced in v2023.1 / v2023.0e. 91 does nothing for v2023.1 v2023.0 v2023.0b-d,f-g. 5 all is set to nodata for pixels without observed data and having solar zenith = 0 in a tile with other solar_zeniths higher than 5 for v2023.0e, v2023.1a-d.
Gap/Stc filtering. This filter set #5 corresponds to v2023.1 and v2023.1a,c, Alaska, Himalayas Note that for Andes, applyFalsePositiveMask was set to 1 (set #405)

Raw cube filtering. Introduced in v2023.1
Raw cube filtering. Introduced in v2023.1
Raw cube filtering. Introduced in v2023.1
Raw cube filtering. Introduced in v2023.1

Stc cube filtering. Introduced 2023-12-08. If 1, set viewable_snow_fraction to nodata for pixels detected as cloudy based on vegetation info Vgap/Veg, only in forested areas (v2023.0g, v2024.0+). If 0, viewable_snow_fraction is considered valid even if pixels detected as cloudy based on vegetation info Vgap/Veg (v2023.0, v2023.0b-f, v2023.1).

Stc cube filtering. Introduced 2023-11-02. If 1, use viewable_snow_fraction rather than snow_fraction for filtering base in FillNaN3() for grain sizes, rf and dv (v2023.1, v2023.0f-g). IF 0, use snow_fraction (v2023.0, v2023.0b-e).

Stc cube filtering. Introduced 2023-11-02. If 1, radiative_forcing and deltavis weighted by weights x viewable_snow_fraction for FillCubeDate() for DV and RF (v2023.1, v2023.0f-g). If 0, by weights only (v2023.0b-e).

Stc cube filtering. Introduced 2023-11-02. If 1, applies a manually defined mask of false positives, including dry lakes (only Andes for v2023.1). If 0, no mask applied (v2023.0b-g and v2023.1 all except Andes).

Stc cube filtering. Introduced 2023-11-17. If 1, removes the days without data at the tile level (i.e. all the pixels are no data) to calculate the threshold number of days before considering snow_fraction unreliable and setting it to 0 (v2023.0, v2023.0c-g). If 0, all days are taken into account. This creates a bias in the late season (v2023.1).

Stc cube filtering. Introduced 2023-11-20. If 1, flattens the temporal interpolation FillCube() for all variables (except solar zenith and azimuth) at the end of a window if there's no data (v2023.1). If 0, doesn't flatten (v2023.0, v2023.0e).
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Pixels having snow_fraction below this threshold are not interpolated
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Minimum number of pixels in a interpolation sliding window to interpolate
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Array of possible half-size of interpolation windows, above which the mea value is affected to pixels to be interpolated
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Default value affected to interpolated pixels if the tile is full of no data. For grain_size variable.
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Default value affected to interpolated pixels if the tile is full of no data. For grain_size variable.
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Default value affected to interpolated pixels if the tile is full of no data. For grain_size variable.
Stc cube interpolation. 2023-12-05. Default value affected to interpolated pixels if the tile is full of no data. For grain_size variable.
